item.title: MySQL: The total number of locks exceeds the lock table size
item.description: If you’re running an operation on a large number of rows within a table that uses the InnoDB storage engine, you might see this error:

item.title: MySQL: The total number of locks exceeds the lock table size
item.description: This problem has cropped up for me a few times, but I’ve always forgotten to make a post about it.
